reviewText: "Now" is from 1992. Audio and video quality are maybe 2 stars: sometimes the audio and video don't synch.  Content is ok-some factual errors and nothing really new. There are a couple audio only Manson interviews which were interesting and insightful. He's not a stupid man. A lot of what he says is true but he has a way of twisting the truth. That is what makes him dangerous.
